item.title: Starting a Personal Mastodon Server
item.description: Introduction to Mastodon and how to get started using it to micro-blog.

item.title: About
item.description: I write posts about projects I have worked on, things I find interesting, and topics I have done research on and want to save what I learned. More about me can be found at my other site mwtaylor.dev. All the code for my projects is in GitHub which is linked on the left. I sometimes post on Mastodon, also linked on the left. Topics include software development, food, movies, and news I find interesting.
